Method Detail

setSearchUrl

void setSearchUrl(String efoSearchUrl)
Sets the Bioportal URL used for searches. It can contain the following placeholders (see MessageFormat javadocs):
  • {0} for the ontology ID (ex. 1136 for EFO)
  • {1} for the query
  • {2} set to 1 for exact matches only, 0 otherwise

Parameters:
efoSearchUrl - the Bioportal URL for searches.

getSearchUrl

String getSearchUrl()

setGetUrl

void setGetUrl(String getUrl)
Sets the Bioportal URL used to get individual concepts. It can contain the following placeholders (see MessageFormat javadocs):
  • {0} for the ontology version ID (ex. 46765 for EFO 2.20)
  • {1} for the concept ID, including the ontology prefix (ex. 'efo:' for EFO).
  • {2} set to 1 for exact matches only, 0 otherwise

getGetUrl

String getGetUrl()

setUseProxy

void setUseProxy(boolean useProxy)

getUseProxy

boolean getUseProxy()

setTimeout

void setTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the timeout for connections to BioPortal web services.

Parameters:
timeout - the timeout in milliseconds.

getTimeout

int getTimeout()
